system.requirements: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Insanity 25+, Furious Zeal. Aptitudes: Willpower, Offence
system.effect: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to increase the penetration of their weapon by their Insanity Bonus until the end of the next turn.

description.value: As a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to increase the penetration of their weapon by their Insanity Bonus until the end of the next turn.
